item.title: MCP Architecture Overview
item.description: MCP Architecture Overview ↩️ Back to Documentation Index Overview The Multi-Agent Control Platform (MCP) is a distributed system designed to streamline and automate Android UVC camera development processes. It employs a Finite State Machine (FSM) architecture with a central orchestrator that manages specialized agents through a lightweight messaging system. This document provides a high-level overview of the system architecture, guiding principles, and references to detailed component specifications.
